name: Imagine - Master Chef [NDS]
description:
'Imagine: Master Chef', alternatively titled 'Imagine: Happy Cooking' in the EU, is an educational cooking simulator developed by MTO for the Nintendo DS. Originally sold in Japan, it was brought overseas and published by Ubisoft on October 23rd, 2007.

Lisa, a little girl, is having a hard time trying to think up a plan for dinner before her father comes back home. As she places her wish upon the stars in the sky, an unexpected angel from the moon will make her meet a famous chef who will help her. The player takes the role of Lisa and is guided through all the steps in order to prepare delicious meals.

Master Chef lets you be the master of your culinary destiny, where anything edible is possible (mmm... this could be interesting)! You can choose to create main courses, sides, and desserts while advancing the captivating story and levels to test your techniques and kitchen 101 skills, with fun characters and minigames to keep any cook-to-be interested!
